INVALID_INPUT_DATA.en: Input data is invalid, please check your inputs
INVALID_INPUT_DATA.da: Inputdata er ugyldige, tjek venligst dine inputs

NO_BUILDING_POLYGON_WIDER_AREA.en: We couldn’t find your house on OpenStreetMap within 15 meters from the marked location point
NO_BUILDING_POLYGON_WIDER_AREA.da: Vi kunne ikke finde dit hus på OpenStreetMap inden for 15 meter fra den markerede lokation

NO_BUILDING_POLYGON.en: The marked location point did not appear to be inside a  building on OpenStreetMaps. Can you try to select a point in the middle of a house again?
NO_BUILDING_POLYGON.da: Den markerede position var vist ikke inden i et hus på OpenStreetMaps. Kan du prøve at markere et punkt igen, der er i midten af bygningen?

GENERIC_PYTHON_ERROR.en: An error has occurred in the application
GENERIC_PYTHON_ERROR.da: Der er opstået en fejl i applikationen

ROOFTOP_PLOTTING_ERROR.en: An error has occurred while plotting your rooftop. Developers have been notified. Please try again later.
ROOFTOP_PLOTTING_ERROR.da: Der opstod en fejl ved visningen af dit tag. Udviklerne er blevet underrettet. Prøv venligst igen senere.

HOUSE_NOT_LOCATED.en: We are sorry, but we unfortunately couldn't find your house. This usually happens if the marked object (house) is too small, or if your house is newly built one.
HOUSE_NOT_LOCATED.da: Vi beklager, men vi kunne desværre ikke finde dit hus. Dette sker normalt, hvis huset er for lille, eller hvis dit hus er nybygget.

HOUSE_TOO_LARGE.en: We are sorry, but we don't support houses that are larger than 550 square metres. For business purposes and for large scale properties, please contact us.
HOUSE_TOO_LARGE.da: Vi beklager, men vi understøtter ikke huse, der er større end 550 kvadratmeter. Hvis det drejer sig om erhvervsgrunde eller store ejendomme, bedes du i stedet kontakte os.

ROOFTOP_ALGORITHM_FAILED.en: We are sorry for the inconvenience, but we were unable to evaluate your house
ROOFTOP_ALGORITHM_FAILED.da: Vi beklager ulejligheden, men vi var ikke i stand til at foretage beregninger for dit hus.

BUILDING_NOT_FOUND_ON_OSM.en: We could not find a building around the chosen coordinates on OpenStreetMaps
BUILDING_NOT_FOUND_ON_OSM.da: Vi kunne ikke finde en bygning omkring de valgte koordinater på OpenStreetMaps

COUNTRY_NOT_SUPPORTED_FOR_OPTIMIZATION.en: This country is not yet supported for the optimal solar plants and batteries setup detection.
COUNTRY_NOT_SUPPORTED_FOR_OPTIMIZATION.da: Dette land er ikke understøttet endnu af vores beregner til optimal opsætning af solcelleanlæg og batterier.

COUNTRY_NOT_SUPPORTED.da: Det angivne land er ikke understøttet

CONSUMPTION_TOO_LOW.en: Your annual electricity consumption is too low to make the investment in solar panels profitable. We recommend that you wait until your consumption increases.
CONSUMPTION_TOO_LOW.da: Dit årlige elforbrug er for lavt til at gøre investeringen i solpaneler rentabel. Vi anbefaler, at du venter, til dit forbrug stiger.
